snippet.title: MY HERO ULTRA RUMBLE — Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
💥MY HERO ULTRA RUMBLE💥 hits the scene September 28th!
That's just a week away! Are you ready to go PLUS ULTRA in a superhero battle royale?

— Join a group of 3 to face off in an 8-team battle royale
— Play as your favorite heroes and villains from the MY HERO series, with new characters added every season
— Kirishima, Yaoyorozu, and Shiozaki join the fight, and all characters from the OBT return as well
— Personalize with costumes, emotes, and more
— Join an agency with your friends and fight to become number one

Play for FREE on Xbox, PlayStation, Steam, and Nintendo Switch on 9/28!

#MYHEROULTRARUMBLE #mhur 
https://playmyheroultrarumble.com

Follow MY HERO ULTRA RUMBLE:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/myherour
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MyHeroUR

Follow Bandai Namco Entertainment America:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcous
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/bandainamcous
